info.description:
# Create External Conversation
Easily create public conversations on external Nextcloud Talk servers directly from the Talk dashboard.
## Key Features
- **Talk Dashboard Integration**: Add-on button with globe icon in Talk sidebar - **Admin Configured**: Central setup in Administration settings for all users - **Public Conversations**: Creates guest-accessible rooms on external servers - **Direct Links**: Generate and share public conversation links instantly - **Secure Authentication**: Basic Auth with dedicated service account
## Quick Start
After installation, go to **Admin Settings â†’ External Nextcloud Talk Server** to configure the external server credentials. Users can then create conversations by clicking the globe button in Talk.
## Usage
1. Click the "Create External Conversation" button in Talk 2. Enter a conversation name 3. Get the public link to share with anyone
Conversations are created as public rooms allowing both authenticated and guest access.
